name: Bark, softwood, average, at forest road, NE-NC
description:
Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.
category: 11: Agriculture, Forestry, Fishing and Hunting/1133: Logging

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Northeast/North Central (NE/NC) region of the US : Connecticut, Delaware, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont, West Virginia, and Wisconsin.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology. Some data extrapolated from similar processes.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Average is calculated based on harvested areas and the specific yield for each type of management intensity.
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
